Name: Spirit
HowToTest: Light smudge sticks near the ghost after an event Spirits will not hunt for about three minutes much longer than others

Name: Wraith
HowToTest: Place salt piles where it walks Wraiths step in salt but leave no UV footprints afterward

Name: Phantom
HowToTest: Take a photo during a ghost manifestation if it vanishes instantly it is a Phantom

Name: Poltergeist
HowToTest: Place several small objects in one room Poltergeist will throw multiple items rapidly or together

Name: Banshee
HowToTest: Use a parabolic mic during ghost activity if you hear a unique long scream sound it is a Banshee

Name: Jinn
HowToTest: Turn the breaker off then on again Jinns move much faster when power is on and the player is far away

Name: Mare
HowToTest: Keep the lights on Mares prefer darkness and will often turn lights off or hunt earlier in the dark

Name: Revenant
Special Traits: Extremely fast during hunts if chasing
HowToTest: Hide during a hunt if it sees you it speeds up rapidly if it loses sight it slows down dramatically

Name: Shade
HowToTest: Stay close to teammates Shades rarely manifest or hunt when multiple players are near

Name: Demon
HowToTest: If the ghost hunts very early or repeatedly despite high sanity it is a Demon

Name: Yurei
HowToTest: Observe sanity drop and door movements if doors slam during events and sanity drains quickly it is a Yurei

Name: Oni
HowToTest: Watch ghost events if it appears visibly longer and throws objects with strong force it is an Oni

Name: Hantu
HowToTest: Turn off the breaker and watch hunt speed if it moves faster in cold areas it is a Hantu

Name: Goryo
HowToTest: Set up a D O T S camera if you see it only on camera feed and not in person it is a Goryo

Name: Myling
HowToTest: During a hunt listen for footsteps if they are very quiet until it is near it is a Myling

Name: Onryo
HowToTest: Place candles near you when one goes out and a hunt starts immediately it is an Onryo

Name: The Twins
HowToTest: Monitor activity in two areas if interactions happen far apart it is The Twins

Name: Raiju
HowToTest: Turn off electronics during a hunt if the ghost slows down when devices are off it is a Raiju

Name: Obake
HowToTest: Check fingerprints over time if they fade fast or show six fingers it is an Obake

Name: The Mimic
HowToTest: If the ghost behavior changes often and there are ghost orbs even without orb evidence it is a Mimic

Name: Moroi
HowToTest: After using spirit box note faster hunts as sanity lowers and slower speed after smudging it is a Moroi

Name: Deogen
HowToTest: Hide and listen during a hunt if it breathes heavily and approaches slowly while always knowing your location it is a Deogen

Name: Thaye
HowToTest: Stay long in the ghost room if activity and speed gradually weaken over time it is a Thaye
